translations: n.走廊，阳台；（店铺面街上方的）遮檐（veranda 的复数）

sentences.sentence: On the fourth side, covered verandas supported by ornate pillars overlook the steps.
sentences.translation: 在第四面，有由华美的柱子支撑的走廊，站在上面可以俯瞰所有阶梯。

sentences.sentence: Lay these POTS along the verandas.
Out on the broad verandas of the hotel, men and women, in cool white, sipped iced drinks and kept their circulation down.
sentences.translation: 旅馆外宽阔的阳台上男男女女穿着凉爽的白衬衫，啜着冰冻的饮料，舒缓着血液循环，可洗衣房里空气却热得要冒泡。
